import "./RaiseTicketFormstyle.css"; export const RaiseTicketForm = () => { const handleChange = async (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); console.log(formData); }; return (

Raise New Ticket

Make sure you enter a valid email that we can contact you if needed

); }
